sentences.en: Dean Richards was recalled to the England squad for the match with Wales.
sentences.cn: 迪安·理查兹被召回英格兰队参加对阵威尔士的比赛。

sentences.en: Everyone was surprised at her omission from the squad.
sentences.cn: 她未列入该编组使大家感到惊讶。

sentences.en: He is a big cheese in the Art Fraud Squad.
sentences.cn: 他是反艺术诈骗专案组的重要人物。

sentences.en: He should have tried out for the Olympic 100 metres squad.
sentences.cn: 他本该参加奥运会百米赛跑的选拔。

sentences.en: It would be great to get a recall to the England squad for Sweden.
sentences.cn: 若能够被召进英格兰队参加对瑞典的比赛那就太棒了。

sentences.en: Murat had looked into the eyes of the firing squad without flinching.
sentences.cn: 穆拉特毫不退缩地直视着执行枪决的行刑队员们的眼睛。

sentences.en: Murder squad detectives approached the man and placed him under arrest.
sentences.cn: 凶杀侦破组警探靠近那名男子，将其逮捕。

sentences.en: plain-clothes detectives from the vice squad
sentences.cn: 取缔性或毒品犯罪行动队的便衣侦探

sentences.en: Sean O'Leary has been named in the England squad to tour Argentina.
sentences.cn: 肖恩·奥利里已入选参加阿根廷巡回赛的英格兰队大名单。

sentences.en: The French were dealt another blow yesterday when Serge Viars withdrew from the squad.
sentences.cn: 昨天塞尔日·维亚尔退出该队令法国人又遭遇了一记重击。

sentences.en: The manager will make a special plea to draft the player into his squad as a replacement.
sentences.cn: 主教练将特别要求抽调这位运动员到他的队里做替补。

sentences.en: The squad members paired off to find places to eat and sleep.
sentences.cn: 小组成员结对儿找地方吃饭睡觉。

sentences.en: They've got a strong squad and some great players.
sentences.cn: 他们有一支实力雄厚的队伍和一些出色的选手。

sentences.en: Those put to death by firing squad included three generals.
sentences.cn: 行刑队处决的那些人里有3名将军。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 杀人小队（一种准军事组织）

trans.tran_cn: （军队中的）班，（暗杀）小组，体育运动的运动（代表）队，（对付某类犯罪活动的）警察队伍
trans.tran_en: a small group of soldiers working together as a unit
